001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.StaticTestData;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.exceptions.StaticTestDataInitializationException;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.QuestFactory;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys;
013import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
014import java.lang.reflect.Method;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Objects;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.function.Consumer;
021import org.junit.jupiter.api.Order;
022import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith;
023import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
024import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext;
025import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException;
026import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver;
027import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
028import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
029
030import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest.STATIC_DATA;
031import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.QUEST;
032import static org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL;
033
034/**
035 * JUnit 5 {@code ParameterResolver} extension for injecting a {@code Quest} instance
036 * into test methods, handling static test data provisioning via {@code @TestStaticData}.
037 *
038 * <p>This extension resolves and provides a test execution context ({@code Quest})
039 * for parameter injection and initializes static test data before test execution.
040 *
041 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
042 */
043@Order(Integer.MIN_VALUE)
044@ExtendWith(SpringExtension.class)
045public class Oracle implements ParameterResolver {
046
047   /**
048    * Determines whether the parameter is eligible for resolution by checking if it is of type {@code Quest}.
049    *
050    * @param parameterContext The context of the parameter to resolve.
051    * @param extensionContext The context of the test execution.
052    * @return {@code true} if the parameter type is assignable to {@code Quest}, otherwise {@code false}.
053    * @throws ParameterResolutionException If an error occurs while resolving the parameter.
054    */
055   @Override
056   public boolean supportsParameter(final ParameterContext parameterContext, final ExtensionContext extensionContext)
057         throws ParameterResolutionException {
058      var parameterType = parameterContext.getParameter().getType();
059      return Quest.class.isAssignableFrom(parameterType);
060   }
061
062   /**
063    * Resolves and injects a {@code Quest} instance into the test method.
064    *
065    * <p>This method initializes a new {@code Quest} instance, decorates it with additional
066    * test utilities, and loads any static test data if defined by {@code @TestStaticData}.
067    *
068    * @param parameterContext The context of the parameter to resolve.
069    * @param extensionContext The context of the test execution.
070    * @return The resolved {@code Quest} instance.
071    * @throws ParameterResolutionException If the required test context cannot be instantiated.
072    */
073   @Override
074   public Object resolveParameter(final ParameterContext parameterContext, final ExtensionContext extensionContext)
075         throws ParameterResolutionException {
076      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(extensionContext);
077      QuestFactory questFactory = appCtx.getBean(QuestFactory.class);
078      DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
079
080      Quest quest = questFactory.createQuest();
081      SuperQuest superQuest = decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class);
082      Map<String, Object> staticTestData = getStaticTestData(extensionContext);
083      Storage storage = superQuest.getStorage();
084      storage.put(STATIC_DATA, staticTestData);
085      addHooksDataInTestStorage(storage, extensionContext);
086      LogQuest.info("The quest: '{}' has begun and is crafted.", extensionContext.getDisplayName());
087      ExtensionContext.Store store = extensionContext.getStore(GLOBAL);
088      store.put(QUEST, quest);
089      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
090      List<Consumer<SuperQuest>> consumers = (List<Consumer<SuperQuest>>) store.get(StoreKeys.QUEST_CONSUMERS);
091      if (Objects.nonNull(consumers)) {
092         consumers.forEach(
093               questConsumer -> questConsumer.accept(decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class)));
094      }
095      return quest;
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Retrieves and instantiates static test data defined via {@code @StaticTestData}.
100    *
101    * <p>If a test method is annotated with {@code @StaticTestData}, this method
102    * dynamically instantiates the specified data provider and extracts its test data.
103    *
104    * @param extensionContext The context of the test execution.
105    * @return A map containing static test data, or {@code null} if no provider is defined.
106    */
107   private static Map<String, Object> getStaticTestData(final ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
108      Optional<Method> testMethod = extensionContext.getTestMethod();
109      if (testMethod.isPresent()) {
110         StaticTestData staticDataAnnotation = testMethod.get().getAnnotation(StaticTestData.class);
111         if (staticDataAnnotation != null) {
112            try {
113               return staticDataAnnotation.value().getDeclaredConstructor()
114                     .newInstance().staticTestData();
115
116            } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
117                     | NoSuchMethodException e) {
118               throw new StaticTestDataInitializationException(e);
119            }
120         }
121      }
122      return new HashMap<>();
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Copies test-level hook parameters from the JUnit {@code ExtensionContext} store
127    * into the framework's {@code Storage}.
128    *
129    * <p>This method is used to propagate test-specific hook data (such as setup/teardown metadata)
130    * from the JUnit context into the test execution context, allowing it to be accessed during the test run.
131    *
132    * @param storage The test storage object where hook data should be inserted.
133    * @param context The JUnit extension context containing the stored hook parameters.
134    */
135   private static void addHooksDataInTestStorage(Storage storage, ExtensionContext context) {
136      Map<Object, Object> hooksStorage = context.getStore(GLOBAL).get(StoreKeys.HOOKS_PARAMS, Map.class);
137      if (hooksStorage != null) {
138         storage.put(StorageKeysTest.HOOKS, hooksStorage);
139      }
140   }
141
142}
